title: SINGLE FAMILY WITH 4 SPLIT LIVING LEVELS TO ENJOY
posting_body: These owners in 2013 bought and over the next few years remodeled the ENTIRE INTERIOR, LANDSCAPED the yard and even paved the exterior.
The Morningside neighborhood is very stately as a general backdrop here.
Green and deep as you like exterior yard and deck space.
Soaring cathedral ceilings, refinished hardwoods, GRANITE KITCHEN with high end (newer if not newly installed) GAS stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, disposal, washer/dryer and full general appliances.
The house is a split, ie - are 4 heated LIVING LEVELS you use.
Chic open design with living to dining to kitchen and AN AMAZING WRAP AROUND floor plan!
With the deep, green as you like, fully fenced in yard space, with owners covering landscaping - that makes this listing the total package !
Owners not trying to break the bank.
As singles go, on the low side monthly.
On pets, 1 cat only considered - up to 4 parking (including 1-2 Garaged).
Pub record sees 4040 square feet (incl fully finished bsmt).
Start date is now to September 1 latest.
